item.description:
Wide-Angle Films presents:

9/11 Mysteries

"Excellent. The best of the 9/11 movies."
-David Ray Griffin, author The New Pearl Harbor

Find out why so many people question the 9/11 mainstream story.
Friday August 17 7 pm at the
Unitarian Universalist Society,
corner of Kellogg/ N. Pleasant Sts.,
Amherst (downtown - near Bart?s).

9/11 Mysteries
Part 1 : Demolitions
90 minutes of demolition evidence and analysis,
laced with eye-opening witness testimonials.

Moving from "the myth" through "the analysis" and
into "the players," careful deconstruction of the
official story set right alongside science.

The 9/11 picture is not one of politics or nationalism or loyalty,
but one of strict and simple physics.

How do you get a 10-second 110-story pancake collapse?

A story of people: Willie Rodriguez's strange recollection of noises
on the 34th floor. Who was up there, bumping around? Scott Forbes'
similar story, weeks before the towers fell. A story of blasting itself.
Here's how shaped charges slice through steel beams to control the way they fall.

information about the film and the series:
http://justiceandpeac... or call 413-256-1760

SPONSORS, we thank you:
Peace and Social Concerns Committee of Mount Toby Friends,
American Friends Service Committee, Traprock Peace Center.
Social Justice Committee of the Unitarian Universalist Society of Amherst, SAGE
item.name: 9/11 Mysteries - Amherst, Friday, 7pm
